ruleset.name: coupling
ruleset.description: These are new rules for coupling

rule.name: CouplingBetweenObjectsRule
rule.message: High amount of different objects as memebers donotes a high coupling
rule.description: Rule counts unique attributes, local variables and return types within an object. An amount higher than specified threshold can indicate a high degree of couping with in an object

rule.name: ExcessiveImportsRule
rule.message: A high number of imports can indicate a high degree of coupling within an object.
rule.description: A high number of imports can indicate a high degree of coupling within an object. Rule counts the number of unique imports and reports a violation if the count is above the user defined threshold.
